en-US.detail: Represents cyclical changes and a turning point in fortune, suggesting to seize the opportunity.

zh-CN.detail: 代表周期性变化与运势转机，建议顺势把握时机。

en-US.content:
The Wheel of Fortune card in the context of your overall trend for next month suggests that a significant shift in your luck is on the horizon. This card symbolizes the cyclical nature of life and the constant changes that come with it. It indicates that you are entering a period where opportunities will present themselves, and it is crucial for you to be open to embracing them.

Embrace the changes that come your way, as they are likely to bring positive outcomes and new beginnings. Trust in the universe's plan for you and have faith that everything is unfolding as it should. Stay open-minded and adaptable to make the most of the opportunities that come your way.

Remember that luck is not just about chance; it is also about being prepared and taking action when the time is right. Be proactive in seeking out new possibilities and be willing to take risks when necessary. By staying attuned to the Wheel of Fortune's message, you can navigate the changes ahead with grace and optimism.

zh-CN.content: 命运之轮在近期机遇分析中，正位显现，预示着运势的周期性变化与转机。如同古老车轮的转动，新的机遇将随之而来。本月，你将面临诸多选择，而每一次选择都可能开启一段全新的旅程。保持开放的心态，顺应运势的流转，你将发现隐藏在平凡日常中的无限可能。记住，命运之轮的转动不可预测，但每一次转动都为你带来了成长与进步的机会。把握当下，勇敢追求，你将发现，机遇往往在不经意间降临。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: There are multiple possibilities, requiring discernment between reality and illusion, and making choices.

zh-CN.detail: 存在多种可能，需辨别现实與幻象并抉择。

en-US.content:
The Seven of Cups in the context of your overall trend for next month suggests that you may find yourself surrounded by a multitude of possibilities and choices. While this can be exciting, it also requires careful discernment to distinguish between what is real and what is merely an illusion. 

This card reminds you to be mindful of getting lost in daydreams or unrealistic fantasies, as they may lead you astray from your true path. It is essential to stay grounded and focused on what truly matters to you. 

In the coming month, you may be presented with various opportunities, but not all of them will be beneficial for your long-term goals. Take the time to evaluate each option carefully and consider the practical implications before making any decisions. 

Remember that not all that glitters is gold, and sometimes the most alluring choices may not be the most fulfilling in the end. Trust your intuition and inner wisdom to guide you towards the path that aligns with your highest good. By staying true to yourself and your values, you can navigate through the sea of possibilities with clarity and confidence.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，圣杯七正位显现，预示着一段充满幻想与选择的时光。这代表你将面临多种可能性，需要辨别现实与幻象，做出明智的抉择。或许，你正沉浸于美好的梦想之中，但别忘了，现实与理想之间需要桥梁。本月，机遇与挑战并存，把握住内心的渴望，勇敢地迈出步伐，你将发现，那些看似遥不可及的梦想，正逐渐成为触手可及的现实。记住，选择比努力更重要，愿你在这段旅程中，找到属于自己的幸福与成功。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 强调公正与承担责任，以理性与原则处理事务。

en-US.detail: Emphasizes justice and taking responsibility, dealing with matters in a rational and principled manner.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，正义牌正位显现，预示着公平与因果的力量将在你的生活中发挥重要作用。这张牌暗示，下个月你将面临诸多选择，而明智的决策将带来丰硕的成果。它提醒你，公正与责任感是成功的关键，应以理性与原则来处理事务。在机遇面前，保持公正的心态，你将发现，每一次的选择都如同天平上的砝码，最终会为你带来应有的回报。记住，正义不仅是一种美德，也是通往成功的必经之路。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, Justice signifies a period where fairness and balance will play a crucial role in shaping your luck. This card urges you to approach situations with a clear and rational mind, making decisions based on integrity and ethical principles. 

In the upcoming month, your actions will have consequences, both positive and negative, depending on how justly you conduct yourself. It is a time to take responsibility for your choices and ensure that you are acting in alignment with your values and beliefs. 

Remember that justice is not just about external circumstances but also about how you treat yourself and others. By embodying fairness and accountability, you can attract positive energy and opportunities into your life. 

Stay true to your moral compass and trust that the universe will reward you for your integrity. Embrace the challenges that come your way as opportunities for growth and learning. Overall, the trend for the next month is one of balance, fairness, and the importance of taking responsibility for your actions.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: Symbolizes consistent and reliable actions, suitable for the implementation of long-term plans.

zh-CN.detail: 象征持续且可靠的行动，适合长期计划的落实。

en-US.content:
The Knight of Pentacles appearing in the overall trend of your fortune next month signifies a period of steady progress and practicality. This card suggests that your luck will be influenced by your ability to stay grounded, focused, and committed to your long-term goals. Just like the Knight, you are encouraged to approach your endeavors with a methodical and reliable attitude, ensuring that every step you take is deliberate and well-thought-out.

This card reminds you to pay attention to the details and not rush into decisions impulsively. By embodying the qualities of the Knight of Pentacles—such as patience, responsibility, and dedication—you will be able to navigate any challenges that come your way with resilience and determination. Trust in your abilities to execute your plans with precision and care, knowing that your efforts will lead to tangible results in the long run.

In the coming month, focus on building a solid foundation for your future endeavors, taking small but consistent steps towards your objectives. Embrace the slow and steady approach of the Knight of Pentacles, and you will find that your luck is closely tied to your ability to stay committed and persistent in your pursuits.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，钱币骑士正位显现，预示着稳健与务实的行动将为你带来持续且可靠的机遇。这张牌暗示，下个月你将有机会通过脚踏实地的努力，实现长期计划。在职业发展上，你可能会遇到一个稳定且具有成长潜力的项目，适合你发挥专业能力。在财务方面，谨慎的投资和理财策略将带来可观的回报。然而，记住，机遇往往伴随着挑战，保持耐心和毅力，你将能顺利驾驭这些机遇，迈向成功。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 情绪控制失衡或操纵情绪。
zh-CN.detail: 可能以情绪控制关系或逃避责任，建议诚实面对感受並承担成熟角色。

en-US.summary: Imbalance in emotional control or manipulation of emotions.
en-US.detail: May be using emotions to control relationships or avoid responsibilities. It is advised to honestly face feelings and take on a mature role.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，圣杯国王逆位暗示着你在情感领域可能面临一些挑战。这或许意味着你在处理人际关系时，可能会因为情绪控制失衡而陷入困境。或许你正试图逃避责任，或是以操纵情绪的方式处理问题。在这样的运势下，建议你勇敢地面对自己的感受，并承担起成熟的角色。或许，通过真诚的沟通和自我反思，你将发现隐藏在情感背后的机遇，从而在人际交往中找到新的平衡点。记住，真正的机遇往往隐藏在看似困境的背后，勇敢面对，你将发现一片新的天地。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed King of Cups suggests a period where emotional imbalance may impact your luck next month. This card indicates a need to address any manipulation of emotions or avoidance of responsibilities that may be present in your life. 

It is essential to honestly confront your feelings and take on a mature role in handling your emotions. By acknowledging and working through any emotional challenges, you can create a more stable and positive foundation for your future luck. 

Be mindful of how your emotional state influences your interactions and decisions, as this can have a significant impact on the overall trend of your fortune. Embrace authenticity and transparency in your relationships and endeavors to ensure that your emotional well-being aligns with the positive flow of luck in the upcoming month. 

Remember that true fortune comes from inner balance and emotional harmony, so take the time to nurture and understand your feelings to pave the way for a more prosperous and fulfilling future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: Empathy turns into emotional overflow or lack of boundaries, suggesting self-care and setting boundaries.

zh-CN.detail: 同理心变为情感泛滥或照顾缺界，建议自我照顾與设界。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Queen of Cups signals a period of emotional turbulence and potential imbalance in the coming month. Your empathetic nature may lead to overwhelming emotions or a tendency to rely too heavily on others for support. This could result in a lack of personal boundaries and self-care, leaving you vulnerable to emotional fluctuations and external influences.

To navigate this phase, it is crucial to prioritize self-care and establish clear boundaries in your relationships. Take time to nurture yourself and address any unresolved emotional issues. By setting healthy boundaries and practicing self-love, you can regain emotional stability and protect yourself from being drained by others' emotions.

Remember that emotional balance is key to attracting positive fortune and opportunities into your life. By tending to your emotional well-being and fostering a sense of inner peace, you can align yourself with the flow of abundance and luck that awaits you in the future. Trust in your intuition and take proactive steps to restore harmony within yourself.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，圣杯王后逆位暗示着你在情感领域可能面临失衡或过度依赖的挑战。这或许意味着你将面临一段需要你更加理智地处理情感关系的时期。在人际交往中，你可能会发现自己在照顾他人的同时，却忽略了自我关怀。建议你在此期间，学会设定界限，平衡给予与索取，避免情感泛滥。或许，通过这次经历，你将学会如何在情感世界中找到属于自己的平衡点。记住，适度地关注自我，是通向内心平和的秘诀。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 以务实與温柔管理资源并照顾家庭与事业。

en-US.detail: Manage resources practically and gently while taking care of both family and career.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，钱币王后正位显现，预示着您将迎来一段充满务实与关怀的时期。这张牌暗示您在资源管理和家庭事业平衡上，将展现出卓越的智慧与温柔。在接下来的日子里，您将有机会运用您的理财能力，把握住一些与金钱相关的机遇。或许是一次投资机会，或是事业上的突破，钱币王后提醒您，在追求物质财富的同时，也不要忽视精神层面的滋养。保持冷静与耐心，您将发现，机遇往往隐藏在平凡之中。

en-US.content:
The Queen of Pentacles appearing in the overall trend of your fortune next month suggests a period where practical care and resource management will be key to your success. This card signifies a time of nurturing both your personal and professional life with a gentle touch. 

In the realm of finances, it advises you to be mindful of your spending and investments, focusing on long-term stability rather than short-term gains. Take a practical approach to managing your resources, ensuring that you have a solid foundation to support your goals.

On a personal level, the Queen of Pentacles reminds you to prioritize self-care and nurturing relationships with loved ones. By balancing your responsibilities with self-care, you can create a harmonious environment that fosters growth and abundance.

In your career, this card encourages you to approach your work with a nurturing and supportive attitude. By taking care of your tasks and colleagues with compassion and practicality, you can enhance your professional reputation and attract opportunities for growth.

Overall, the Queen of Pentacles advises you to embrace a mindset of abundance and generosity, both in your personal and professional life. By managing your resources wisely and nurturing your relationships, you can create a positive and prosperous future for yourself.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 透過放下或暂停获得新视角，适合接受与转换。

en-US.detail: Gain a new perspective through letting go or pausing, suitable for acceptance and transformation.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，倒吊人正位牌的出现预示着一段暂停与反思的时期。它暗示你或许正站在人生的一个十字路口，需要暂时放下手中的事务，以全新的视角审视现状。这并非意味着停滞不前，而是为了在未来的道路上找到更适合自己的方向。在这段时期，机遇可能隐藏在看似平凡的事物中，学会耐心等待，细心观察，你将发现新的可能性。记住，倒吊人正位牌鼓励你接受变化，勇敢地转换视角，你将迎来意想不到的机遇。

en-US.content:
The Hanged Man appearing in the fortune overall trend dimension suggests that next month, you may experience a period of pause or surrender that will lead to a new perspective on your luck. This card encourages you to let go of old patterns or beliefs that may be holding you back and embrace a different way of thinking. By taking a step back and allowing yourself to see things from a different angle, you may find unexpected opportunities for growth and transformation.

During this time, it is important to trust in the process and have faith that everything is unfolding as it should. Embrace the idea of surrendering control and allowing the universe to guide you towards your highest good. This period of reflection and introspection may bring about a shift in your overall luck, leading to positive changes and new beginnings.

In order to make the most of this energy, consider practicing mindfulness, meditation, or other forms of self-reflection. Pay attention to any intuitive insights or signs that may come your way, as they could offer valuable guidance. Remember, sometimes the greatest fortune comes from letting go and allowing the universe to work its magic.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 代表稳健的物质管理與可靠领导。

en-US.detail: Represents steady material management and reliable leadership.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，钱币国王正位显现，预示着物质掌控与负责的时期即将到来。这张牌暗示你将迎来一段稳健的财务管理和可靠领导的机会。在接下来的日子里，你将有机会在财务上做出明智的决策，确保资源的合理分配。同时，你的领导能力将得到展现，你将能够引导团队朝着共同的目标前进。抓住这些机遇，你将能够稳固你的物质基础，并在职业和个人生活中取得显著成就。记住，耐心和智慧是关键，让钱币国王的指引引领你走向成功。

en-US.content:
The King of Pentacles appearing in the overall trend of your fortune next month signifies a period of stability and financial security. This card suggests that you will have a strong grasp on your material resources and will be able to manage them with wisdom and responsibility. 

In the context of your overall luck, the King of Pentacles urges you to take a practical and grounded approach to your finances. It indicates that you have the ability to make sound investments and decisions that will lead to long-term prosperity. This card also highlights the importance of being reliable and trustworthy in your dealings with others, as this will further enhance your financial success.

To make the most of this positive trend, focus on building a solid foundation for your future financial goals. Take the time to assess your current financial situation and make any necessary adjustments to ensure long-term stability. Consider seeking advice from a financial advisor or mentor to help you make informed decisions.

Overall, the King of Pentacles is a reminder to stay disciplined and focused on your financial goals. By embodying the qualities of this card—such as practicality, reliability, and diligence—you can expect a favorable outcome in your financial endeavors next month.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: Represents a new start in emotions or relationships, bringing resonance and healing.

zh-CN.detail: 表示感情或关系的新起点，带来共鸣與疗愈。

en-US.content:
The Ace of Cups appearing in the context of overall trend for next month suggests a significant emotional upsurge and a period of deep nourishment for your soul. This card signifies a fresh start in your emotional realm, bringing with it a sense of fulfillment and healing. It indicates that your luck will be closely tied to your ability to connect with your feelings and those of others around you.

During this time, pay attention to your intuition and emotional responses, as they will guide you towards positive outcomes. Open yourself up to new experiences and relationships, allowing yourself to be vulnerable and receptive to the love and support that surrounds you. Trust in the flow of emotions and let them lead you towards greater fulfillment and happiness.

To enhance your luck during this period, focus on self-care, nurturing your relationships, and expressing your emotions authentically. Engage in activities that bring you joy and peace, and be open to receiving the blessings that the universe has in store for you. Remember, emotional abundance is a key factor in shaping your overall fortune next month.

zh-CN.content: 在即将到来的下个月，圣杯王牌正位预示着一段情感或关系的新生与滋养。这预示着一段充满共鸣与疗愈的机遇即将到来。或许，你将遇到那个能与你心灵相通的人，或是与现有关系达到更深层次的连接。在这段时间里，保持开放的心态，珍惜每一次交流的机会，你将发现，幸福与满足正悄然降临。记住，用心去感受，用爱去回应，让圣杯王牌的指引引领你走向美好的未来。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 回避抉择或内在冲突显现。
zh-CN.detail: 拒绝面对难题导致僵局，建议整合信息並逐步决断。

en-US.summary: Avoiding decision-making or inner conflicts surfacing.
en-US.detail: Refusing to confront challenges leads to a stalemate, it is advised to integrate information and make decisions gradually.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑二暗示着你在面对选择时可能陷入了犹豫不决的境地。这并非意味着你缺乏机遇，而是内心深处存在某种冲突，使得你难以果断作出决策。在这样的运势下，建议你深入反思，整合信息，逐步明确自己的立场。或许，通过冥想或与信任的朋友交流，你将找到那把开启机遇之门的钥匙。记住，勇敢面对内心的冲突，才能在机遇面前把握住属于自己的命运。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Two of Swords suggests a period where indecision and avoidance may hinder your luck next month. By refusing to confront challenges or inner conflicts, you risk creating a stalemate in your life. This card serves as a gentle warning to not shy away from making necessary decisions or addressing unresolved issues.

In the context of overall trend, this card indicates that your luck may be affected by your reluctance to face difficult choices or situations. It is essential to acknowledge the information presented to you and gradually work towards making decisions that align with your highest good. By integrating all aspects of your life and taking small steps towards resolution, you can break free from the standstill and move forward with more clarity and purpose.

Embrace the discomfort of uncertainty and trust that by making thoughtful choices, you can shift the course of your fortune in a positive direction. Remember, avoiding decision-making only prolongs the inevitable and may hinder your overall luck. Take the time to reflect, gather information, and trust your intuition to guide you towards a brighter future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 可能缺乏准备或鲁莽，建议审慎评估與规划。

en-US.detail: May lack preparation or act recklessly, it is advisable to carefully assess and plan.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，愚者牌逆位显现，暗示你可能会面临一些犹豫不决或缺乏准备的状况。这并非意味着你将遭遇失败，而是提醒你，在追求目标的过程中，过于冲动或草率可能会带来不必要的困扰。在即将到来的一个月里，建议你保持冷静，审慎评估每一个机遇，避免盲目行动。或许，在深思熟虑之后，你将发现隐藏在平凡中的非凡机遇，只需勇敢迈出第一步，便能开启一段新的旅程。记住，愚者逆位并非预示着阻碍，而是提醒你，在机遇面前，智慧与勇气同样重要。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend fortune, The Fool reversed suggests a period of hesitation and lack of preparation in the upcoming month. This may indicate a time where you are feeling unsure about the path ahead or are tempted to take risks without considering the consequences. It is crucial to take a step back and carefully assess your decisions before moving forward.

While The Fool can sometimes symbolize a sense of freedom and spontaneity, in the context of overall trend fortune, it serves as a warning to avoid impulsive actions that could lead to setbacks. This card urges you to prioritize planning and foresight in all areas of your life to ensure a smoother journey ahead.

Consider taking the time to reflect on your goals and aspirations, and create a solid plan to achieve them. Embrace a mindset of mindfulness and caution, allowing yourself to navigate challenges with grace and wisdom. By approaching situations with a thoughtful and strategic mindset, you can steer clear of unnecessary risks and pave the way for more stable and positive outcomes in the future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 真相被扭曲或沟通受阻。
zh-CN.detail: 信息混乱或言语伤害，需澄清事实並以冷静重建共识。

en-US.summary: The truth is distorted or communication is blocked.
en-US.detail: Information is confused or words are hurtful, clarify the facts and rebuild consensus calmly.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，宝剑王牌逆位显现，暗示着沟通的迷雾笼罩了你的机遇之路。这并非意味着机遇本身消失，而是提醒你真相可能被扭曲，言语之间可能存在误解或伤害。在接下来的一个月里，你需保持冷静，以清晰的思维去梳理信息，避免被混乱的表象所迷惑。在寻求合作或决策时，务必确保信息的准确性，以重建共识，让机遇的光芒得以照亮你的前行之路。记住，在迷雾中寻找灯塔，耐心与智慧将是你最宝贵的财富。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Ace of Swords signals a period where clarity and truth may be elusive. Miscommunication or distorted information could lead to misunderstandings or conflicts that hinder your luck next month. It is essential to tread carefully in your interactions and ensure that you seek out the facts before making decisions.

This card urges you to be vigilant in deciphering the messages you receive and to avoid jumping to conclusions based on incomplete or misleading information. Take the time to clarify any uncertainties and strive to rebuild trust and consensus in your relationships and endeavors. By approaching challenges with a calm and rational mindset, you can navigate through this period with grace and integrity.

Remember that words have power, and in the context of fortune, the way you communicate and handle information can significantly impact your luck. Stay mindful of your speech and actions, choosing honesty and diplomacy over harshness or deceit. By embracing the lessons of the reversed Ace of Swords, you can pave the way for a more harmonious and fortunate future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 象征阶段终结与重生，提示放下旧有以迎接新生。

en-US.detail: Symbolizes the end of a phase and rebirth, suggesting letting go of the old to welcome the new.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，死神牌正位出现，预示着即将迎来一段重要的转变期。它象征着结束与转化，意味着你将告别过去，迎接新的开始。在这个阶段，或许会有一些挑战和困难，但正是这些经历，将为你带来深刻的成长和领悟。死神牌提醒你，放下那些束缚你的旧有观念和习惯，勇敢地迈向新的生活。在这个过程中，你将发现隐藏在困境背后的机遇，只要敢于突破，就能迎来全新的未来。记住，每一次结束都是新生的开始，勇敢地迎接挑战，你将收获意想不到的成果。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the Death card signifies a significant shift in your luck for the upcoming month. This card heralds the end of a cycle, urging you to embrace transformation and let go of what no longer serves you. While this may initially seem daunting, remember that endings pave the way for new beginnings.

In the context of your overall trend, Death suggests that you may experience a period of closure or completion in various aspects of your life. This could manifest as the resolution of long-standing issues, the conclusion of projects, or the shedding of old habits. Embrace these changes with an open heart, as they are essential for your growth and evolution.

As you navigate this period of transition, trust in the process and have faith that the universe is guiding you towards a brighter future. Embrace the opportunities that come your way, even if they initially seem challenging. Remember, every ending is a chance for rebirth and renewal.

In the coming month, stay open to new possibilities and be willing to release what no longer serves your highest good. Embrace the transformative energy of Death and allow it to lead you towards a more fortunate and fulfilling path.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 提示对现状冷感，建议内省尋找新机会。

en-US.detail: Indicates indifference to the current situation, suggesting introspection to seek new opportunities.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，圣杯四正位牌面暗示着一段反思与不满足的时期。这表明下个月你可能会对现状感到冷漠，对现有的机会和资源产生质疑。在这样的运势下，建议你深入内省，寻找内心真正渴望的新机遇。或许，你需要暂时放下手中的忙碌，静心聆听内心的声音，才能发现那些隐藏在平凡生活中的不凡机遇。记住，真正的机遇往往在不经意间出现，保持开放的心态，你将发现新的可能性。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the Four of Cups suggests a period of introspection and contemplation. Your luck next month may be influenced by a sense of dissatisfaction with your current circumstances, leading you to question your path and desires. This card encourages you to look within yourself for new opportunities and perspectives that may not be immediately apparent.

It is essential to pay attention to subtle signs and messages from the universe during this time. While it may seem like luck is stagnant, there are hidden blessings waiting to be discovered if you are open to receiving them. Take this opportunity to reassess your goals and priorities, as there may be a need for a shift in perspective to invite positive change into your life.

Consider exploring new interests or hobbies that spark your curiosity and bring a sense of fulfillment. By embracing this period of reflection, you can uncover valuable insights that will guide you towards a more fortunate and fulfilling future. Trust in the process of self-discovery and remain open to the possibilities that lie ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 提醒调和对立、恢复节制，有利于疗愈与稳定。

en-US.detail: Remind to harmonize opposites, restore Temperance, beneficial for healing and stability.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，节制牌正位出现，预示着您在下个月将面临需要平衡与整合的机遇。这张牌提醒您，在追求目标的过程中，保持内心的平和与稳定至关重要。它象征着您将有机会通过调和不同元素，实现个人成长与事业发展的双重丰收。在具体行动上，建议您保持冷静，避免冲动决策，以智慧的眼光审视每一个机遇，从而在纷繁复杂的环境中找到属于自己的平衡之道。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the Temperance card signifies a period of balance and integration in your upcoming month. This card urges you to seek harmony in all aspects of your life, blending opposing forces to create a sense of equilibrium. Just as the figure on the card mixes water between two cups, you are encouraged to find a middle ground between different areas of your life.

Embracing the energy of Temperance can bring about a sense of healing and stability in your fortune. By finding moderation and avoiding extremes, you can navigate challenges with grace and poise. This card suggests that by maintaining a sense of calm and patience, you can attract positive energy and opportunities into your life.

In the coming month, focus on restoring balance and order to your surroundings. Take time to reflect on your actions and decisions, ensuring that they align with your values and goals. By embracing the principles of Temperance, you can set the stage for a period of growth and prosperity.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 象征成熟的领导力與决断力，适合引领方向。

en-US.detail: Symbolizes mature leadership and decisiveness, suitable for guiding the way.

zh-CN.content: 权杖国王正位出现在运势维度下，预示着你在下个月将迎来领导与果断的机遇。这张牌象征着成熟的领导力与决断力，意味着你将有机会引领方向，把握主动权。在职业领域，你可能会被委以重任，成为团队的核心人物；在个人生活中，你将展现出坚定的意志，勇敢地追求自己的目标。然而，机遇与挑战并存，需保持冷静与智慧，以应对可能出现的困难。记住，权杖国王的指引下，你的领导力将为你带来丰硕的成果。

en-US.content:
The King of Wands appearing in the overall trend of your fortune next month signifies a period where your leadership qualities will be highlighted. You will find yourself in a position of authority, where your decisiveness and assertiveness will be key in shaping your luck. Embrace your inner strength and confidence to navigate any challenges that come your way.

This card suggests that taking a proactive approach to situations will yield positive outcomes. Trust your instincts and make bold decisions with conviction. Your ability to inspire and motivate others will be instrumental in creating a harmonious and successful environment around you.

In order to make the most of this fortunate trend, it is essential to stay focused on your goals and maintain a clear vision of what you want to achieve. Be open to new opportunities that may come your way, but also remember to stay grounded and practical in your approach.

Overall, the King of Wands encourages you to step into your power and lead with passion and determination. By embodying the qualities of this card, you will attract abundance and prosperity into your life next month.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: Brings opportunities for warm memories and healing, suitable for connecting with the past.

zh-CN.detail: 带来温暖回忆與修复的机会，适合连接过去。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the Six of Cups signifies a period where luck is intertwined with nostalgia and emotional healing. This card suggests that next month, you may find yourself revisiting memories from the past that hold significant meaning or unresolved emotions. These reflections could bring about a sense of comfort and understanding, allowing you to heal old wounds and move forward with a lighter heart.

Embrace the opportunities that arise to connect with your past experiences, as they may hold valuable lessons or insights that can guide you towards a more fortunate path. Take time to nurture your inner child and explore activities that bring you joy and a sense of innocence. By immersing yourself in these moments of nostalgia, you may uncover hidden treasures that can positively influence your future endeavors.

Remember to approach this period with an open heart and a willingness to embrace the past with compassion and understanding. Allow yourself to release any lingering burdens or regrets, and welcome the healing energy that the Six of Cups brings. Trust in the process of healing and know that by honoring your past, you are creating a more fortunate future for yourself.

zh-CN.content: 在即将到来的下个月，圣杯六正位预示着一段温馨的回忆之旅。这将是一个修复与连接过去的机遇，让你在忙碌的生活中找到心灵的慰藉。或许，某个旧友的来信，或是一次偶然的聚会，将唤醒你内心深处的美好记忆。抓住这个机会，让过去的温暖照亮你的未来。在运势方面，这将是一个充满爱与和谐的月份，适合你与家人、朋友共度美好时光，也为你带来新的灵感与动力。记住，珍惜眼前的每一刻，让回忆成为你前行的力量。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 伤痛被压抑或延迟处理，需正视情绪並寻找支持。

en-US.summary: Unhealed heartache or refusing to heal.
en-US.detail: Pain is suppressed or delayed, need to face emotions and seek support.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑三暗示着你在下个月可能会面临一些未愈合的心痛或拒绝疗伤的情感问题。这可能是由于过去的伤痛被压抑或延迟处理，导致你在面对新的机遇时，内心仍存有阴影。在这样的运势下，你需要正视自己的情绪，勇敢地寻找支持和帮助。或许，通过与他人分享你的感受，或是寻求专业的心理咨询，你将能够释放内心的负担，从而为新的机遇敞开大门。记住，疗愈的过程虽然痛苦，却是成长的必经之路。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trends, the reversed Three of Swords suggests a period where unresolved heartache or emotional pain may be hindering your luck. This card indicates that there may be a reluctance to address deep-seated emotions or heal from past wounds, leading to a stagnation in your overall fortune.

It is crucial to acknowledge and confront these feelings, as avoiding them will only prolong the suffering and potentially block positive energies from flowing into your life. Seek support from trusted friends, family, or a professional counselor to help you navigate through this challenging time.

By facing your emotions head-on and actively working towards healing, you can shift the energy surrounding you and open yourself up to new opportunities and improved luck in the coming month. Remember that healing is a process, and it is okay to take the time you need to heal and grow from your experiences. Embrace this period as a chance for personal growth and transformation, and trust that better fortune awaits once you have tended to your emotional well-being.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 资源或技巧未被正向使用，需检视方法与意图。

en-US.detail: Resources or skills are not being used in a positive way, requiring a review of methods and intentions.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的魔术师牌暗示着你在运用技能和资源时可能存在滥用或误导的风险。这或许意味着你正面临一个看似充满机遇的时期，但实际操作中却可能因为方法不当或意图不明而遭遇阻碍。建议你在此期间，审视自己的行动和决策，确保每一项资源或技巧都能得到正向的运用。或许，通过调整策略，你将能发现隐藏在机遇背后的深层含义，从而引领你走向真正的成功。记住，智慧与直觉的平衡是关键。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend fortune, The Magician reversed suggests a period where your luck may be influenced by a misuse of your skills or resources. This card warns against deception and manipulation, indicating that your current methods and intentions may not be serving you well. It is essential to reflect on how you are utilizing your talents and assets, as there may be a tendency to take shortcuts or engage in dishonest practices.

This card urges you to reassess your approach and ensure that you are acting with integrity and authenticity. By aligning your actions with your true values and purpose, you can avoid the pitfalls of deceit and misuse of power. Take this time to review your strategies and make any necessary adjustments to ensure that you are operating from a place of honesty and transparency.

Remember that true success comes from using your skills and resources in a positive and ethical manner. By embodying the qualities of The Magician in its upright position—such as creativity, focus, and mastery—you can steer your fortune in a more favorable direction. Trust in your abilities, but always stay true to your principles to attract the abundance and prosperity you seek.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 揭示被欲望或习惯束缚之处，需识别并寻求解脱。

en-US.detail: Revealing areas where one is bound by desires or habits, and the need to identify and seek liberation.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，恶魔牌正位出现，暗示你可能会面临一些诱惑和束缚。这可能是来自物质欲望、不良习惯或是外界压力。在这段时间里，你需警惕这些诱惑，以免陷入困境。恶魔牌提醒你，要认清自己的欲望，并努力寻求解脱。或许，通过调整心态、改变生活习惯，你将发现新的机遇在向你招手。记住，真正的自由来自于内心的觉醒，勇敢面对诱惑，你将迎来更加美好的未来。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend fortune, The Devil card signifies a period where you may find yourself entangled in situations that limit your growth and hinder your luck. This card serves as a warning to pay attention to areas in your life where you are bound by desires, addictions, or negative patterns that hold you back from reaching your full potential.

It is essential to recognize these self-imposed restrictions and take proactive steps to break free from them. By acknowledging the temptations that keep you trapped, you can begin the process of liberation and pave the way for better fortune in the upcoming month. This may involve making difficult choices, confronting inner demons, or seeking support from others to overcome these challenges.

Embrace this opportunity for self-reflection and transformation, as breaking free from the bondage of The Devil card can lead to a brighter and more fortunate future. Trust in your ability to release yourself from these constraints and open yourself up to new possibilities that align with your highest good. Remember, true fortune lies in the freedom to pursue your dreams without being held captive by your own limitations.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: Drive creativity and nurture others or projects with passion and intuition.

zh-CN.detail: 以热情與直觉推动创造並滋养他人或项目。

en-US.content:
The Queen of Wands appearing in the overall trend of your fortune next month signifies a period of heightened passion and support in your life. This card urges you to tap into your creative drive and approach all endeavors with enthusiasm and intuition. Embrace your inner fire and let it guide you towards success and fulfillment.

In the realm of fortune, the Queen of Wands suggests that your luck will be closely tied to your ability to nurture your projects and relationships with zeal and determination. Trust your instincts and take bold actions to manifest your desires. This card encourages you to be a beacon of inspiration for others, offering your support and encouragement wherever it is needed.

As you navigate the upcoming month, remember to stay connected to your inner flame and let it illuminate your path. Embrace challenges with confidence and use your passion to fuel your endeavors. By embodying the qualities of the Queen of Wands, you will attract positive energy and opportunities into your life. Trust in your abilities and let your passion lead you towards abundance and success.

zh-CN.content: 权杖王后在运势-近期机遇的维度下，正位显现，预示着您在下个月将迎来充满热情与支持的机遇。这张牌象征着您将以充沛的活力和直觉推动创造，无论是个人项目还是团队协作，都将得到滋养与成长。在机遇面前，保持开放的心态，倾听内心的声音，您将发现新的可能性。同时，权杖王后提醒您，在追求目标的过程中，不妨给予他人支持和鼓励，共同创造美好未来。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 内在声音被压抑或信息被隐藏，适合回归内省。

en-US.detail: Inner voice suppressed or information concealed, suitable for introspection.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的女祭司牌暗示着直觉的受阻或信息的隐匿。这表明在下个月，你可能难以直接捕捉到那些潜在的机会。你的内在声音可能被压抑，或者关键信息被隐藏，这要求你回归内省，深入挖掘自己的直觉和内在智慧。在这个过程中，耐心和洞察力将成为你的关键。虽然机遇可能不那么明显，但通过内省和直觉的引导，你将能够发现那些隐藏的线索，从而把握住真正的机遇。记住，有时候，最珍贵的机遇隐藏在看似平凡的事物之中。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, The High Priestess reversed suggests that your intuition may be blocked or hidden information may be at play in the upcoming month. This could indicate a period where your inner voice is suppressed, making it challenging to tap into your innate wisdom and guidance. It may also point to situations where important information is being concealed from you, leading to confusion or uncertainty in your path forward.

During this time, it is crucial to engage in introspection and reflection to uncover the truths that may be hidden beneath the surface. Pay attention to your dreams, gut feelings, and subtle signs from the universe. Trust in your instincts and allow yourself to explore the depths of your subconscious mind.

While the reversed High Priestess may bring a sense of mystery and intrigue to your fortune, it also serves as a reminder to trust in your inner knowing and seek the truth that lies beyond the veil. Embrace the journey of self-discovery and be open to the insights that may come your way, even if they are not immediately clear. Remember that sometimes the greatest revelations come from within.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 带来震荡与真相显露，虽然痛苦但促成重建。

en-US.detail: Bringing shock and revelation, although painful, it leads to rebuilding.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，塔牌正位显现，预示着一场突如其来的变革即将到来。这或许是一次对现状的强烈冲击，但也是觉醒与成长的契机。在接下来的日子里，你可能会面临一些意想不到的挑战，但正是这些挑战，将促使你洞察真相，从而实现自我重建。在这个过程中，保持开放的心态，勇敢面对变化，你将发现新的机遇在向你招手。记住，每一次的跌宕起伏，都是通往更高境界的必经之路。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend fortune, The Tower signifies a period of sudden and unexpected change that may initially bring discomfort or upheaval. This upheaval, however, is a necessary catalyst for transformation and growth. Just as a tower must crumble before it can be rebuilt stronger, so too must old structures in your life give way to make room for new beginnings.

Embrace this time of awakening with courage and openness, for it holds the potential for profound personal evolution. Trust that the universe is guiding you towards a higher purpose, even if the path seems unclear at the moment. Allow yourself to release what no longer serves you and welcome the opportunity for renewal.

In the coming month, be prepared for revelations that may shake your current reality but remember that from chaos comes clarity. Stay grounded in the present moment and be willing to adapt to the changes unfolding around you. Embrace the unknown with a sense of curiosity and optimism, knowing that the universe is aligning in your favor.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 无法放松导致恢复受阻，建议安排休息並寻求安稳。

en-US.summary: Difficult to rest or resist recovery.
en-US.detail: Inability to relax hinders recovery, it is recommended to rest and seek stability.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑四预示着一段休整期的挑战。这表明你可能会面临难以放松身心，抗拒恢复的状态。在接下来的一个月里，你可能会发现自己在面对机遇时，内心充满了犹豫和挣扎。这并非意味着机遇不存在，而是提醒你需要调整心态，学会适时地放下，才能更好地迎接挑战。建议你合理安排休息时间，寻求内心的宁静，让身心得到充分的恢复，以便在机遇来临时，能够以最佳状态迎接。记住，真正的机遇往往在宁静中孕育而生。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall fortune trends, the reversed Four of Swords suggests a period where finding peace and rest may prove challenging. Your luck next month may be influenced by a sense of restlessness or an inability to fully recover from past challenges. It is crucial to acknowledge the need for relaxation and stability during this time.

This card urges you to prioritize self-care and seek moments of calm amidst the chaos. By allowing yourself the space to rest and recharge, you can better align with the flow of positive energy and opportunities that the universe has in store for you. Embrace practices that promote mental and physical well-being, such as meditation, mindfulness, or gentle exercise.

Remember that true fortune often stems from a place of inner peace and balance. By taking the time to nurture yourself, you can create a solid foundation for luck and abundance to manifest in your life. Trust in the process, and know that by honoring your need for rest, you are paving the way for a brighter and more prosperous future ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 因为付出过多而疲惫，需重建界限與自我照顾。

en-US.detail: Feeling exhausted due to giving too much, need to establish boundaries and practice self-care.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的皇后牌暗示着你在下个月可能会面临过度付出的困境。这并非意味着机遇的缺失，而是提醒你需在追求目标的过程中，学会平衡与自我照顾。皇后逆位提醒你，过于倾注精力可能导致身心俱疲，此时宜重建个人界限，学会拒绝，以避免不必要的耗竭。在机遇面前，保持清醒的头脑，审慎选择，避免盲目投入，才能在纷繁复杂中找到真正属于你的机遇之光。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, The Empress reversed suggests a period of excessive giving and depletion. Your luck next month may be influenced by feeling drained from constantly putting others' needs before your own. This card urges you to establish boundaries and prioritize self-care to avoid burnout. Remember that nurturing yourself is just as important as nurturing others. 

Consider where you may be overextending yourself and explore ways to balance your giving nature with self-preservation. Take time to rest, recharge, and replenish your energy reserves. By setting healthy boundaries and practicing self-care, you can ensure that your luck improves in the coming month. Trust that by honoring your own needs, you will create a more sustainable and fulfilling path forward. Embrace the nurturing energy of The Empress in a way that supports both yourself and those around you.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 和解或认错的机会出现。
zh-CN.detail: 冲突趋于结束，适合低姿态修补关系並学习教训。

en-US.summary: Opportunity for reconciliation or admitting mistakes.
en-US.detail: Conflicts are coming to an end, it is suitable to mend relationships with humility and learn the lessons.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑五预示着一段冲突的结束，但同时也暗示着需要以谦卑的姿态去修补关系，从中吸取教训。这并非意味着你将面临直接的挑战，而是提醒你，在即将到来的月份里，机遇往往隐藏在和解与认错之中。或许，通过放下过去的争执，你将发现新的合作机会，或是修复与他人的关系，从而开启一段新的旅程。记住，逆位的宝剑五在提醒你，真正的力量来自于内心的平和与宽容。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Five of Swords heralds a shift in luck towards reconciliation and resolution. This card signifies that conflicts and challenges are reaching their conclusion, paving the way for healing and understanding. It suggests that the upcoming month holds opportunities for making amends, admitting mistakes, and seeking forgiveness.

Embracing humility and learning from past experiences will be key to navigating this period of transition. By acknowledging where things went wrong and taking steps to mend relationships, you can set the stage for a more harmonious future. Remember that true fortune often lies in the ability to grow from adversity and cultivate positive connections with others.

As you move forward, consider how you can approach situations with a spirit of openness and willingness to find common ground. Embrace the lessons that come your way, and be open to the possibilities that arise from resolving conflicts with grace and understanding. Trust that by embracing this energy of reconciliation, you can pave the way for greater fortune and harmony in the days ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 代表情感上的损失，需要面对并逐步疗愈。

en-US.detail: Represents emotional loss, which needs to be faced and gradually healed.

zh-CN.content:
在近期机遇的运势分析中，圣杯五正位显现，预示着你在情感领域将面临一段失落与哀伤的时期。这或许意味着你将经历一段关系的结束，或是失去某个重要的情感寄托。在这个过程中，你可能会感到心痛和迷茫，但请相信，这是成长的一部分。

在这段时期，机遇可能隐藏在疗愈与自我反思之中。学会接受并面对情感上的损失，将有助于你找到新的方向。在这个过程中，保持耐心与开放的心态，你将发现，每一次的失落都是通往内心深处的机会。记住，时间是最好的疗愈者，而每一次的挫折，都将成为你未来成功的垫脚石。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the Five of Cups suggests a period of emotional turbulence and potential setbacks. This card signifies that next month may bring moments of loss and sorrow, where you might find yourself dwelling on past disappointments or regrets. It is essential to acknowledge these feelings and allow yourself to grieve what has been lost before you can move forward.

While this card may indicate a challenging time ahead, it also serves as a reminder that healing and growth can emerge from facing these emotions head-on. By confronting your pain and learning from your experiences, you can pave the way for a brighter future. Remember that setbacks are often opportunities in disguise, leading to personal transformation and a deeper understanding of yourself.

During this period, focus on self-care, introspection, and seeking support from loved ones. Allow yourself to process your emotions without judgment, and trust that this phase is temporary. By embracing the lessons that come with loss, you can emerge stronger and more resilient in the long run.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 权力或规则失衡，建议放下强制並恢复弹性。

en-US.detail: Imbalance of power or rules, suggested to let go of coercion and restore flexibility.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的皇帝牌暗示着您可能会面临权力或规则的失衡。这或许意味着您在追求目标的过程中，过于依赖强制和僵化的方法，导致机遇的流失。建议您放下过度的控制，恢复内心的弹性，以更灵活的态度去应对挑战。或许，在适当的时候，放手一搏，才能发现隐藏在规则之外的机遇。记住，真正的力量来源于内心的平和与智慧。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend fortune, The Emperor reversed suggests a period where excessive control and rigidity may hinder your luck next month. This imbalance of power or rules could lead to missed opportunities and a sense of stagnation. It is vital to recognize the need to let go of coercion and restore flexibility in your approach to various aspects of your life.

By loosening your grip on strict structures and allowing for more adaptability, you can invite positive shifts in your fortune. Embrace a more open-minded and collaborative attitude towards situations that arise, as this will create space for new opportunities to flow into your life. Remember that true power comes from a place of balance and understanding, rather than dominance and control.

To enhance your luck next month, consider exploring different perspectives, being open to change, and practicing patience in the face of challenges. By releasing the need for excessive control and embracing a more fluid approach, you can invite greater fortune and abundance into your life.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 象征恢复信念與指引，带来治愈與启示。

en-US.detail: Symbolizes the restoration of faith and guidance, bringing healing and enlightenment.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，星星牌正位显现，预示着一段充满希望与疗愈的时光即将来临。这张牌象征着信念的恢复与指引的降临，它将为你带来治愈与启示。在未来的日子里，你将有机会在迷茫中找到方向，在困境中感受到温暖的力量。星星牌的指引将引领你走向光明，让你在机遇面前更加坚定与自信。把握住这些机遇，你将发现生活充满了无限可能。记住，信念与希望是开启成功之门的钥匙。

en-US.content:
The Star card appearing in the overall trend of fortune for the next month signifies a period of hope and healing. This card brings a sense of renewal and guidance, indicating that luck is on your side as you navigate the upcoming weeks. Embrace the positive energy of this card and trust that the universe is aligning in your favor.

In practical terms, this card encourages you to stay optimistic and maintain a sense of faith in the face of challenges. By focusing on the light at the end of the tunnel, you can attract positive outcomes and opportunities into your life. Take this time to reflect on your goals and aspirations, as The Star suggests that your dreams are within reach.

To make the most of this fortunate trend, consider engaging in activities that promote healing and self-care. Whether it's meditation, journaling, or spending time in nature, prioritize practices that nourish your mind, body, and spirit. By aligning yourself with the healing energy of The Star, you can set the stage for abundance and blessings to flow into your life.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 过渡未完成或难以离开问题，建议面对原因并寻求实际方案。

en-US.summary: Avoidance or trapped in old situations.
en-US.detail: Transition is incomplete or difficult to move away from the problem. It is recommended to face the reasons and seek practical solutions.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑六暗示着你在面对新的机遇时，可能正陷入一种逃避或困于旧境的状态。这或许意味着你尚未完成某个阶段的过渡，或者难以割舍过去的困扰。在这样的运势下，建议你勇敢面对问题的根源，寻求实际可行的解决方案。或许，你需要放下过去的束缚，才能拥抱新的机遇。记住，勇敢地迈出第一步，往往能开启一片新的天地。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Six of Swords suggests a period where luck may seem stagnant or difficult to navigate. This card indicates that you may be avoiding necessary changes or feeling trapped in old patterns that hinder your progress. It is crucial to acknowledge the reasons behind this stagnation and actively seek practical solutions to move forward.

While transition may feel incomplete or challenging, it is essential to confront the underlying issues and address them head-on. By facing the obstacles in your path and actively seeking ways to overcome them, you can shift the energy surrounding your luck and create a more favorable outcome. Embrace the discomfort of change and trust that by taking decisive action, you can steer your fortune in a more positive direction.

Remember that luck is not solely determined by external forces but also by your willingness to confront challenges and adapt to new circumstances. Stay open to new possibilities and be proactive in seeking opportunities for growth and transformation. By embracing change and facing your obstacles with courage and determination, you can shift the overall trend of your fortune towards a more favorable outcome.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 可能面临信念冲突或导师失衡，需重新评估价值观。

en-US.summary: Dogma or beliefs are being questioned.
en-US.detail: You may be facing conflicts in beliefs or imbalance with a mentor, requiring a reassessment of values.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的教皇牌暗示着您可能会面临信念的考验。这并非意味着您将失去方向，而是提示您需要审视自己的价值观和信仰体系。在接下来的一个月里，您可能会遇到一些挑战，这些挑战将促使您重新评估自己的信念，并可能引发与他人的观念冲突。在这样的时期，保持开放的心态，倾听不同的声音，将有助于您找到新的平衡点。记住，真正的成长往往源于对既有认知的质疑与突破。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Hierophant signals a period where your luck may be influenced by questioning established beliefs or traditions. This card suggests that your current path may be hindered by rigid dogma or conflicting ideologies, leading to a sense of imbalance in your life.

It is essential to take this time to reassess your values and beliefs, as they may be holding you back from experiencing the full extent of your luck. Embrace the opportunity to challenge conventional wisdom and explore new perspectives that align more closely with your authentic self.

Seek guidance from mentors or spiritual leaders who can offer a fresh outlook on your situation. Be open to unconventional methods or teachings that may lead you towards a more fortunate path. Remember, fortune favors the bold and those willing to break free from restrictive patterns.

Embrace this period of questioning and transformation with an open heart and mind. By releasing outdated beliefs and embracing new ways of thinking, you can pave the way for greater luck and abundance in the coming month. Trust in the process and remain open to the unexpected blessings that may come your way.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 真相被揭露或放下诡计。
zh-CN.detail: 隐秘行动带来后果，适合诚实并修复信任。

en-US.summary: Truth being revealed or letting go of deception.
en-US.detail: Secret actions leading to consequences, suitable for honesty and rebuilding trust.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑七预示着真相的揭露可能带来意想不到的后果。这暗示你可能会面临一些隐藏的挑战，它们可能源于过去的决策或行为。在处理这些机遇时，建议你保持诚实，勇于面对现实，以修复可能受损的信任。虽然揭露真相可能会带来一时的困扰，但长远来看，这将有助于你清除障碍，为未来的发展铺平道路。记住，勇敢地面对困难，你将能从中获得成长与智慧。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Seven of Swords brings a message of truth being unveiled and the shedding of deceitful layers. This card signifies that hidden actions or secrets may come to light in the upcoming month, leading to consequences that demand honesty and transparency. It suggests that any deceptive behavior or manipulation will not go unnoticed, urging you to confront the truth and let go of any illusions.

Embrace this period as an opportunity to rebuild trust and integrity in your life. By facing the repercussions of past actions with honesty and accountability, you can pave the way for a more authentic and harmonious future. Take this time to reflect on your motivations and intentions, ensuring that your actions align with your values and principles.

Remember that the truth has a way of setting you free, even if it may initially bring discomfort or challenges. Embrace this period of revelation as a chance to realign yourself with your true path and make amends where necessary. Trust that by embracing honesty and integrity, you can navigate the twists and turns of fate with grace and resilience.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 涉及情绪與直觉，提示辨识幻象并倾听内心。

en-US.detail: Involves emotions and intuition, suggesting the recognition of illusions and listening to the inner self.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，月亮牌正位出现，暗示你将面临潜意识的引导与幻象的辨识。这表明下个月，你可能会遇到一些看似美好实则模糊不清的机遇。月亮牌提醒你，要用心聆听内心的直觉，辨识其中的真实与虚幻。在追求机遇的过程中，保持清醒的头脑，避免被表面的诱惑所迷惑。或许，真正的机遇隐藏在那些看似平凡的选择之中，需要你用心去挖掘。记住，直觉是你的指南针，跟随它，你将找到属于自己的光明之路。

en-US.content:
The Moon card appearing in the overall trend of your fortune next month suggests that your luck may be influenced by hidden emotions and subconscious patterns. This card urges you to pay attention to your intuition and inner voice, as they may guide you towards recognizing illusions and uncovering truths that have been obscured.

Embrace the mystery and uncertainty that The Moon brings, as it can lead you to deeper insights and understanding. Trust your instincts and allow yourself to explore the realms of the subconscious, as they hold valuable information that can shape your fortune in the coming month.

Be mindful of any illusions or self-deceptions that may be clouding your judgment. Take time to reflect on your emotions and examine any fears or doubts that may be holding you back. By facing these inner shadows, you can clear the path for positive opportunities and growth.

Overall, The Moon encourages you to delve into the depths of your psyche and embrace the unknown with courage and curiosity. By listening to your inner wisdom and navigating the realm of the subconscious, you can unlock new possibilities and shape your fortune in a profound and transformative way.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 关系中价值冲突或选择未定，建议沟通並澄清。

en-US.detail: Conflicting values or undecided choices in the relationship, it is recommended to communicate and clarify.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的“恋人”牌预示着你在感情或人际关系上可能面临失衡或犹豫的挑战。这或许意味着你将面临价值冲突或选择未定的困境。在这样的时期，沟通与澄清显得尤为重要。或许，你需要深入反思自己的内心，明确自己的需求和期望，以便在人际交往中找到平衡点。在这个过程中，保持开放的心态，倾听他人的意见，同时也要坚定自己的信念。记住，真正的机遇往往隐藏在看似复杂的困境之中，勇敢面对，你将发现新的可能性。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, The Lovers card reversed suggests a period of imbalance or hesitation in your relationships. This may indicate conflicting values or unresolved decisions that could impact your luck in the coming month. It is essential to address any communication gaps or uncertainties within your relationships to avoid further complications.

This card serves as a reminder to take a closer look at the dynamics in your personal and professional connections. Are there unresolved issues causing tension or misunderstandings? Are you feeling torn between different paths or choices? By acknowledging and addressing these imbalances, you can pave the way for smoother interactions and a more harmonious future.

To improve your overall luck next month, it is crucial to engage in open and honest conversations with those involved. Seek clarity, express your thoughts and feelings, and listen attentively to the perspectives of others. By fostering understanding and cooperation, you can navigate through any challenges and create a more positive environment for growth and prosperity.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 逐步解除束缚或观念突破。
zh-CN.detail: 限制感减弱，鼓励寻找外援與新视角来解放自己。

en-US.summary: Gradually releasing constraints or breaking through beliefs.
en-US.detail: The feeling of limitation weakens, encouraging seeking external support and new perspectives to liberate oneself.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑八暗示着束缚与限制的逐步解除。这预示着下个月，你将迎来一段解放自我的旅程。或许，你将摆脱旧有的思维模式，寻找新的视角和外援，以突破现状。在这个过程中，保持开放的心态，勇于尝试，你将发现隐藏在束缚背后的机遇。记住，每一次的突破都是自我成长的机会，把握住它，你将迎接更加广阔的未来。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Eight of Swords heralds a significant shift in luck for the upcoming month. This card signifies a gradual release from self-imposed constraints or limiting beliefs that have hindered progress. As the feeling of restriction weakens, it is essential to embrace this newfound freedom by seeking external support and exploring fresh perspectives.

This card suggests that the upcoming month will bring opportunities to break through barriers and overcome challenges that have held you back. Embrace this period of liberation by actively seeking out guidance, whether from mentors, friends, or professional advisors. Be open to new ideas and ways of thinking that can help you navigate towards a more fortunate path.

Remember, luck is often a combination of preparation and opportunity. Use this time to reflect on your goals and aspirations, and be willing to adapt your approach as needed. By embracing change and being open to different possibilities, you can harness the positive energy of the reversed Eight of Swords to steer your fortune in a more favorable direction.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 代表清晰與活力，带来成功與积极能量。

en-US.detail: Represents clarity and vitality, bringing success and positive energy.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，太阳牌正位显现，预示着一段充满阳光与活力的时期即将到来。这张牌象征着成就与喜悦，暗示你将在下个月迎来一系列令人振奋的机遇。或许是一次事业上的突破，或是个人生活中的重大转折，太阳牌的正面能量将为你带来成功与积极的能量。把握住这些机遇，如同沐浴在温暖的阳光下，你将感受到前所未有的成长与喜悦。记住，在这段旅程中，保持乐观的心态，勇敢地追求梦想，你将收获满满的成就与喜悦。

en-US.content:
The Sun card in the context of your overall trend for next month signifies a period of great fortune and positivity. This card brings with it a sense of achievement and joy, indicating that you are on the right path towards success. The Sun's energy will shine brightly upon you, illuminating any obstacles in your way and providing you with the clarity and vitality needed to overcome them.

This card suggests that your luck will be at its peak next month, bringing with it a wave of positive energy that will help you manifest your desires and goals. Embrace this time of abundance and allow yourself to bask in the warmth of The Sun's rays. Trust in the universe to guide you towards the opportunities and blessings that await you.

To make the most of this fortunate period, focus on staying optimistic and open to new possibilities. Take bold steps towards your dreams and don't be afraid to step into the spotlight. Remember to express gratitude for all the blessings that come your way, as gratitude will only attract more abundance into your life. Trust in the universe's plan for you, and let The Sun's energy light your path towards a bright and prosperous future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

en-US.detail: Indicates reflection and renewal, may enter a new phase or be called upon.

zh-CN.detail: 提示反思與更新，可能进入新的阶段或呼召。

en-US.content:
Judgement in the context of overall trend for fortune signifies a period of awakening and reflection in the upcoming month. This card suggests that you may be at a crossroads where you need to make important decisions that will shape your future luck. It is a time for introspection and evaluation of your past actions and choices.

This card indicates that you may be called upon to make significant changes or embrace a new phase in your life. It encourages you to listen to your inner voice and trust your intuition when navigating through upcoming opportunities or challenges. Embrace this period of renewal with an open mind and a willingness to let go of old patterns that no longer serve you.

In the realm of fortune, Judgement reminds you to pay attention to signs and synchronicities that may guide you towards a more favorable outcome. Trust in the process of transformation and be open to unexpected blessings that may come your way. Stay attuned to your inner calling and be ready to step into a brighter future with confidence and clarity.

zh-CN.content:
在近期机遇的运势分析中，正位的“审判”牌预示着一场深刻的觉醒与自我检视的旅程。这张牌暗示着下个月，你将面临一个重要的转折点，需要审视自己的过去、现在和未来。在这个过程中，你可能会发现隐藏在内心深处的潜能，从而开启一段全新的生活篇章。

这个时期，机遇与挑战并存。一方面，你将有机会摆脱过去的束缚，迎接新的开始；另一方面，也可能需要面对内心的恐惧和不安。在这个过程中，保持开放的心态，勇敢地面对自己，将是你抓住机遇的关键。

记住，审判并非惩罚，而是成长的机会。在反思与更新的过程中，你将逐渐找到属于自己的道路，迎接更加美好的未来。

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 焦虑缓和或重新获得希望。
zh-CN.detail: 梦魇逐渐消散，建议寻求支持並实践放松方法。

en-US.detail: Nightmares gradually dissipating, it is recommended to seek support and practice relaxation methods.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，宝剑九逆位暗示着一段紧张与焦虑的时期即将告一段落。如同梦魇逐渐消散，你将迎来新的希望。这并非意味着所有问题都将迎刃而解，而是提醒你，在寻求支持的同时，不妨尝试一些放松身心的方法。或许，一次深呼吸、一段冥想，或是与亲友的倾诉，都能为你带来意想不到的机遇。记住，内心的平静与和谐，是开启成功之门的钥匙。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Nine of Swords brings a glimmer of hope amidst a period of anxiety or distress. This card suggests that your luck is gradually shifting for the better, signaling a time of easing worries and finding solace in the midst of challenges.

As the nightmares of the past begin to dissipate, it is crucial to seek support from those around you and practice relaxation techniques to aid in this transition. Remember that hope is on the horizon, and by taking proactive steps to address your concerns, you can pave the way for a more positive future.

Embrace this period of transformation with an open heart and a willingness to let go of past fears. Trust that the universe is guiding you towards a brighter path, and have faith in your ability to overcome obstacles with grace and resilience. Stay grounded in the present moment and focus on self-care to nurture your well-being during this time of transition.

Overall, the reversed Nine of Swords encourages you to remain optimistic and trust in the process of change. By releasing anxieties and embracing hope, you can set the stage for a more fortunate and fulfilling future ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 动力受阻或方向不明，需调整计划並稳住节奏。

en-US.detail: Obstacles in momentum or unclear direction, requiring adjustment of plans and maintaining a steady pace.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的战车牌预示着你在追求目标的过程中可能会遭遇动力受阻或方向不明的困境。这并非意味着你将完全迷失方向，而是提醒你需在行动前深思熟虑，调整计划，稳住节奏。或许，你正站在人生的十字路口，需要重新审视自己的目标和路径。在这个过程中，耐心与坚持至关重要。不妨放慢脚步，倾听内心的声音，或许会有意想不到的机遇悄然降临。记住，逆位的战车牌虽带来挑战，却也蕴藏着成长与转化的契机。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, The Chariot reversed suggests a period of uncertainty and obstacles in your path. Your luck may seem to falter, and you might feel like you have lost your way or are acting impulsively without a clear direction. This could lead to a sense of frustration or feeling stuck in your current circumstances.

To navigate this challenging phase, it is essential to take a step back and reassess your goals and plans. Look for areas where you can make adjustments and realign your focus. Instead of rushing forward, take the time to carefully consider your next steps and ensure they are in line with your long-term objectives.

Maintaining a steady pace is crucial during this time. Avoid making hasty decisions or taking unnecessary risks. By staying grounded and focused, you can overcome the obstacles in your path and regain momentum towards your desired outcomes.

Remember, fortune is not solely determined by external circumstances but also by your ability to adapt and persevere in the face of challenges. Trust in your inner strength and resilience to guide you through this period of uncertainty.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 象征周期的完成與整合，适合庆祝與收尾。

en-US.detail: Symbolizes the completion and integration of a cycle, suitable for celebration and closure.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，世界牌正位显现，预示着一段旅程的圆满结束，或是某个阶段的成功达成。这张牌象征着周期的完成与整合，暗示你即将迎来一段宁静与庆祝的时光。在接下来的日子里，你可能会遇到一些重要的机遇，它们将是你过去努力与积累的回报。把握这些机遇，如同拥抱一个全新的开始，它们将引领你走向更加广阔的天地。在这段旅程中，保持开放的心态，相信自己的直觉，你将发现隐藏在平凡中的不凡。

en-US.content:
The World card in the context of your overall trend for next month signifies a period of completion and fulfillment in your fortune. This card suggests that you are reaching the end of a significant cycle in your life, where all your efforts and hard work are coming to fruition. It indicates that you are on the brink of achieving a long-term goal or realizing a dream that has been in the making for some time.

Embrace this moment of celebration and closure, as it marks a successful conclusion to a chapter in your life. The World card encourages you to reflect on your journey, acknowledge your achievements, and take pride in how far you have come. It also reminds you to remain open to new possibilities and opportunities that may arise as you transition into the next phase of your life.

As you move forward, remember to carry the wisdom and lessons learned from this cycle with you. Stay grounded, stay focused, and continue to pursue your goals with determination and optimism. Trust that the universe is aligning in your favor, and that your luck is set to improve even further in the coming months.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 可能过于自我怀疑或以消极方式表达情绪，需自我接纳。

en-US.summary: Self-confidence being frustrated or suppressed anger.
en-US.detail: May be overly self-doubting or expressing emotions in a negative way, need self-acceptance.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的“力量”牌暗示着你在面对挑战时，可能会感到自信受挫或压抑愤怒。这表明你可能在某些方面过于自我怀疑，或者以消极的方式表达情绪。在这样的运势下，建议你学会自我接纳，以更加平和的心态去面对生活中的挑战。或许，你需要放下过去的负担，勇敢地面对现实，才能在机遇面前展现出真正的力量。记住，逆境中的成长往往更为珍贵，愿你能在挑战中找到属于自己的力量。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Strength card suggests a period where your self-confidence may be wavering, leading to potential frustration and suppressed emotions. This could manifest as doubts about your abilities or feeling overwhelmed by challenges that come your way. It is crucial to address these feelings and work towards self-acceptance during this time.

In terms of luck for the upcoming month, this card indicates that you may encounter situations that test your inner strength and resilience. It is essential to confront any negative emotions or self-doubt that may be holding you back from embracing opportunities that come your way. By acknowledging and working through these feelings, you can regain a sense of empowerment and confidence in navigating the twists and turns of fate.

Remember that luck is often a reflection of our inner state, so focusing on cultivating a positive mindset and addressing any underlying issues will help shift the energy in your favor. Embrace the challenges as opportunities for growth and transformation, and trust in your ability to overcome obstacles with grace and determination.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 带来创造性机会與行动的起点，鼓励尝试。

en-US.detail: Brings creative opportunities and the beginning of action, encouraging experimentation.

zh-CN.content: 权杖王牌在近期机遇分析中，预示着新的开始与灵感涌现。这张牌正位出现，暗示你将在下个月迎来充满创造力的机遇。它鼓励你勇敢尝试，开启一段新的旅程。或许，这将是一个改变你生活轨迹的起点，让你在追求梦想的道路上迈出坚定的一步。把握住这个机会，让灵感引领你前行，你将发现无限可能。记住，勇敢尝试，才能收获成功。

en-US.content:
The Ace of Wands appearing in the fortune overall trend dimension signifies a surge of inspiration and new beginnings in your luck next month. This card heralds a period of creative opportunities and the initiation of exciting ventures. It suggests that you will be filled with a sense of passion and motivation to pursue your goals with vigor.

In the context of overall trend, the Ace of Wands encourages you to embrace experimentation and take bold steps towards your aspirations. It indicates that luck will be on your side as you embark on fresh endeavors and explore uncharted territories. Trust in your instincts and allow your creativity to flow freely, as this card promises success through innovation and originality.

To make the most of this fortunate period, be open to new ideas and approaches. Stay proactive and seize the opportunities that come your way with confidence. Embrace the energy of the Ace of Wands to ignite your passions and set the stage for a dynamic and fulfilling month ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 虽然结束痛苦仍在，但恢复与重建的可能正在出现。

en-US.summary: Slow recovery or a new beginning.
en-US.detail: Although the pain of the ending still lingers, possibilities for recovery and rebuilding are emerging.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑十预示着一段艰难的结束可能刚刚开始，但同时也暗示着缓慢的复原与新的起点。这代表着你可能正面临挑战，内心充满痛苦与挫败，但请相信，这是成长与转变的必经之路。在这段时期，机遇可能隐藏在看似无望的困境之中，需要你保持耐心，细心挖掘。或许，通过这次经历，你将找到新的方向，开启一段全新的旅程。记住，逆境中的坚持与努力，终将为你带来意想不到的收获。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Ten of Swords signifies a gradual shift towards healing and renewal. While the wounds of the past may still feel raw, this card suggests that the worst is behind you, and a new beginning is on the horizon. Embrace the opportunity to let go of old pain and embrace the potential for growth and transformation.

This card encourages you to focus on self-care and self-compassion as you navigate this period of transition. Take the time to reflect on the lessons learned from past challenges and use them to inform your path forward. Remember that endings are often necessary for new beginnings to take root.

Stay open to unexpected opportunities and be willing to release any lingering negativity or self-doubt. Trust in the process of healing and trust that better days are ahead. Embrace the energy of resilience and perseverance as you move towards a brighter future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 过度退缩或拒绝求助，建议适度开放並寻求支持。

en-US.detail: Excessive withdrawal or refusal to seek help, it is advised to open up moderately and seek support.

zh-CN.content: 隐者牌逆位出现在运势分析中，暗示你下个月可能会面临孤立无援的境地。这并非意味着你将完全孤立，而是提醒你在这段时间内，可能需要更加谨慎地选择与谁分享你的想法和计划。在机遇面前，你可能会因为过于保守而错失良机。建议你适度开放心扉，寻求他人的支持和建议，这样不仅能拓宽视野，也可能带来意想不到的机遇。记住，适当的内省是必要的，但过度退缩则可能让你错过成长的机会。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, The Hermit reversed suggests a period of missed opportunities due to isolation or a reluctance to seek guidance. Your luck next month may be influenced by a tendency to withdraw from others or resist introspection. This could lead to a sense of stagnation or missed chances for growth.

It is important to recognize the value of opening up to others and seeking support when needed. While independence is valuable, excessive self-reliance can hinder progress. Consider reaching out to trusted friends, mentors, or professionals for advice and perspective. Embracing collaboration and seeking different viewpoints can lead to new opportunities and a more positive trajectory in the future.

Remember that seeking help is not a sign of weakness but a strength. By allowing yourself to connect with others and share your thoughts and feelings, you can break free from the limitations of isolation and invite positive energy into your life. Embrace the wisdom of The Hermit in a balanced way, finding the middle ground between solitude and connection for a more fortunate path ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 学习或沟通起点受阻，建议核实来源並稳步准备。

en-US.detail: Obstacles in learning or communication, it is recommended to verify the source and prepare steadily.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑侍者预示着信息传递的延误或误导。这暗示着在下个月，你可能会遇到沟通上的阻碍，或是接收到的信息并不完全准确。在这样的运势下，建议你保持耐心，仔细核实信息的来源，避免因误解而做出错误的决策。同时，这也是一个学习和成长的起点，通过这个过程，你将学会如何更加谨慎地处理信息，为未来的机遇做好准备。记住，稳步前行，智慧地选择，才能在机遇面前把握住属于自己的命运。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend fortune, the reversed Page of Swords suggests a period of delayed or misleading messages that may impact your luck next month. This card indicates obstacles in learning or communication, urging you to be cautious of the information you receive. It is essential to verify the source of any news or advice that comes your way, as there may be hidden agendas or misinformation at play.

In the context of your overall trend, this card advises you to approach situations with a discerning eye and a steady preparation. Be mindful of any potential misunderstandings or miscommunications that could affect your luck in the coming month. Take the time to double-check details and ensure that you have all the facts before making important decisions.

While this period may bring challenges in terms of receiving clear and accurate information, it also presents an opportunity for growth and learning. Use this time to sharpen your communication skills and cultivate a deeper understanding of the messages you encounter. By staying vigilant and taking a methodical approach, you can navigate through any obstacles that may arise and ultimately enhance your overall luck in the future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 周期被延迟或抗拒改变，需适应並寻找新路径。

en-US.detail: The cycle is delayed or change is resisted, adaptation is needed to find a new path.

zh-CN.content: 命运之轮逆位，预示着在近期机遇方面，你可能会遇到一些停滞或抗拒变化的局面。这如同命运之轮暂时停滞，预示着周期被延迟，改变似乎遥不可及。在这样的运势下，你需要适应并寻找新的路径。或许，一次看似偶然的相遇，一次意外的机会，将成为你突破现状的关键。保持开放的心态，耐心等待，命运之轮终将转动，为你带来新的机遇。

en-US.content:
In the realm of overall trend, the reversed Wheel of Fortune suggests a period where luck may seem stagnant or change is being resisted. This card indicates a delay in the natural cycle of fortune, urging you to adapt and find a new path forward. It is essential to recognize that while external circumstances may not be aligning in your favor at the moment, your internal attitude and willingness to embrace change can greatly influence the overall trend of your luck.

Consider this time as an opportunity to reflect on your current situation and identify areas where you may be holding onto outdated beliefs or habits that are hindering your progress. Embrace flexibility and openness to new possibilities, as they may lead you towards a more favorable outcome in the long run. Trust in the universe's timing and remain patient as you navigate through this period of resistance.

Remember, fortune is not solely determined by external forces but also by your own actions and mindset. Stay proactive, stay positive, and be ready to seize opportunities as they arise. This phase of stagnation is temporary, and with the right mindset, you can turn the wheel of fortune in your favor once again.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.summary: 冲动受挫或鲁莽被控制。
zh-CN.detail: 行动力下降带来反思时机，适合规划后再出手。

en-US.detail: Decreased motivation brings opportunity for reflection, suitable for planning before taking action.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，逆位的宝剑骑士似乎在提醒你，冲动与鲁莽可能带来挫败。它暗示着，你或许正面临行动力下降的时期，这并非坏事，反而是一个反思与规划的绝佳时机。在这段时间里，建议你放慢脚步，深思熟虑后再行动。或许，一些看似诱人的机遇，在深入思考后，会发现并非那么适合你。保持冷静，耐心等待，机遇自会水到渠成。记住，智慧的选择往往比一时的冲动更为可靠。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, the reversed Knight of Swords suggests a period of decreased motivation and potential frustration. This shift in energy may actually be a blessing in disguise, as it allows for a moment of reflection and introspection before charging forward impulsively. 

During the upcoming month, it is essential to take this time to pause and carefully plan your next steps. Rushing into decisions or actions may lead to setbacks or missed opportunities. Embrace this temporary slowdown as an opportunity to reassess your goals, refine your strategies, and ensure that your actions are aligned with your long-term vision.

While it may feel frustrating to not be in the fast-paced, action-oriented mindset of the upright Knight of Swords, remember that patience and thoughtful planning can lead to more sustainable and successful outcomes in the long run. Trust that this period of reflection will ultimately serve your best interests and set the stage for future growth and success.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 强调策略制定與远景规划，关注合作可能。

en-US.detail: Emphasizes strategic planning and long-term vision, focusing on potential collaborations.

zh-CN.content: 权杖二在近期机遇分析中，正位显现，预示着你在下个月将迎来一段充满策略与计划的时期。这张牌象征着视野的拓展和决策的成熟，暗示你将有机会从更广阔的角度审视问题，并制定出切实可行的计划。在这个过程中，合作将成为关键，你可能会遇到志同道合的伙伴，共同开创美好未来。然而，这也意味着你需要保持耐心，因为成功往往需要时间的积累。在这段旅程中，保持清晰的头脑和坚定的信念，你将发现机遇无处不在。

en-US.content:
The Two of Wands appearing in the context of overall trend for your fortune next month suggests a period of strategic planning and forward-thinking. This card urges you to focus on long-term goals and vision, emphasizing the importance of laying down solid foundations for future success. 

In the realm of fortune, the Two of Wands indicates that your luck will be influenced by your ability to plan ahead and make decisions that align with your ultimate aspirations. This card encourages you to explore new opportunities and consider potential collaborations that could lead to greater prosperity in the long run.

To enhance your luck next month, it is essential to take a step back and assess your current situation from a broader perspective. Look beyond immediate gains and think about how your choices now can shape your future outcomes. Stay open to new ideas and partnerships that may offer fresh insights and possibilities.

By embracing the energy of the Two of Wands and focusing on strategic planning and vision, you can set yourself on a path towards greater fortune and success in the coming month. Trust in your ability to make wise decisions and take calculated risks that will lead to positive outcomes in the long term.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 早期努力显现前景，适合扩展與寻找伙伴。

en-US.detail: Early efforts manifesting opportunities, suitable for expansion and seeking partners.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，权杖三正位显现，预示着拓展与远见的时机已经到来。这张牌暗示你将在下个月迎来一段充满活力的成长期，你的努力将逐渐显现出成果，为你的未来描绘出一片广阔的前景。在这段时间里，你将有机会拓展自己的视野，寻找志同道合的伙伴，共同开创事业的新篇章。然而，这也意味着你需要付出更多的努力和耐心，才能抓住这些机遇。记住，成功往往伴随着挑战，勇敢地迎接它们，你将收获意想不到的成果。

en-US.content:
The Three of Wands appearing in the context of your overall trend for next month suggests that your luck is on the rise, signaling a period of expansion and foresight in your fortune. This card indicates that the early efforts you have put in will begin to bear fruit, opening up new opportunities for growth and success. 

You may find yourself in a position where partnerships and collaborations become key to your overall trend. It is a favorable time to seek out like-minded individuals who can help you expand your horizons and achieve your goals. Keep an eye out for potential allies or mentors who can offer valuable insights and support along your journey.

Embrace the spirit of exploration and be open to new possibilities that may come your way. Trust in your instincts and have confidence in your ability to navigate the path ahead. By staying proactive and forward-thinking, you can make the most of the positive energy surrounding you and set yourself up for a prosperous and fulfilling month ahead.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 提示退隐反思以寻求更深的洞见与智慧。

en-US.detail: Suggests withdrawing for reflection to seek deeper insights and wisdom.

zh-CN.content: 隐者牌在近期机遇分析中，正位显现，预示着您在下个月将迎来一段内省与寻真的时光。这并非偶然，而是宇宙为您精心安排的机遇。在这段时间里，您或许会感到孤独，但请相信，这是为了让您更深入地了解自己，挖掘内在的潜能。机遇往往隐藏在看似平凡的日子里，建议您保持耐心，细心观察，或许在不经意间，您会发现那些被忽视的宝藏。记住，真正的智慧来源于内心的平静与自我认知。

en-US.content:
In the realm of fortune and overall trend, The Hermit card suggests that next month may bring a period of introspection and seeking truth in your life. This card signifies a time for withdrawing from external influences to focus on inner reflection and personal growth. By taking a step back and delving deep into your thoughts and emotions, you may uncover valuable insights that can guide you towards a more fortunate path.

Embrace solitude and quiet contemplation during this time, as it will allow you to connect with your inner wisdom and intuition. Trust in your own judgment and seek answers from within rather than relying on external sources. The Hermit encourages you to explore your beliefs, values, and goals to gain clarity on what truly matters to you.

As you navigate the upcoming month, remember that fortune favors those who are willing to look inward and seek the truth. By taking the time to reflect on your life and choices, you may discover hidden opportunities and blessings that have been waiting for you to uncover them. Trust in the journey of self-discovery and allow The Hermit to illuminate your path towards a more fortunate future.

en-US.description: How will my luck be next month?

zh-CN.detail: 需要捍卫立场并在压力下保持韧性。

en-US.detail: It is necessary to defend your position and maintain resilience under pressure.

zh-CN.content: 在近期机遇的运势分析中，权杖七正位显现，预示着你在下个月将面临挑战与考验。这张牌象征着防守与坚持，意味着你需要捍卫自己的立场，并在压力之下保持韧性。在机遇面前，你可能会遇到阻碍，但只要坚定信念，勇往直前，便能突破困境，收获成功。记住，逆境中的坚持往往能带来意想不到的转机。在行动上，保持冷静，审时度势，方能把握住机遇，迈向辉煌。

en-US.content:
